message: I like how convore is using the browsers scroll bar to scroll the message list.  I'm thinking of breaking down their css to see how they set it up, but was wondering if anyone had beaten me to it (because I'm lazy).
Looks like everything about and to the left of the convo is position: fixed. Works out pretty nicely though!
@RyanOnRails some browsers don't do a great job of composting fixed position elements. Which browser are you using?
I find the scrolling really clunky on this. Not sure why but it feels really juttery.
@RyanOnRails you'd actually have to make it out to another one of our meetups first! ;)
@RyanOnRails weird. maybe you just need to stop running so many VM's on it! ;)
@MarkBennett Only 1 VM running :P My laptop has 8 gigs of ram. It's clunky! I'm not crazy! Next meetup i'll show you *shakes fist*!
@MarkBennett *shakes fist*. I talked to my boss, I should be in Edmonton more often after the end of March.
